text: (unakee baaton se) qareeb hai ki saare aasamaan (usakee haibat ke maare) apane oopar vaar se phat pade aur farishte to apane paravaradigaar kee taareef ke saath tasabeeh karate hain aur jo log zameen mein hain unake lie (gunaahon kee) maaphee maanga karate hain sun rakho ki khuda hee yaqeenan bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
